content.query:
-- create in master DB
CREATE LOGIN atalati WITH PASSWORD = 'ThisIsNotVerySecure!'; 
CREATE USER atalati FROM LOGIN atalati;

-- create in specific db
EXEC sp_addrolemember 'db_owner', 'atalati';

-- create DB scope credential that will be used to access (only required to create once per DB)
-- generate a shared access signature from the ADLS container where the gerated data is placed and paste in the SECRET below
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [oaidataairawdls]
WITH IDENTITY='SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',  
SECRET = 'sv=2021-12-02&ss=bfqt&srt=sco&sp=rwdlacupyx&se=2025-04-08T04:55:48Z&st=2023-04-07T20:55:48Z&spr=https&sig=czkS9giI%2BCHVNLoGIfiIA83pR9DEFRvd%2FzuRoxVGuVU%3D'
GO

--DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE salesData
--DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [oaiParquetFormat]
--DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL [oaidataairawdls]

-- define the file format for external table
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [oaiParquetFormat]
       WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

-- define the data source for the external table
-- Replace the ADLS account name and the container name in the appropriate places below
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE salesData
WITH (    
       LOCATION   = 'abfss://sales@dataairawdls.dfs.core.windows.net'
)
GO

-- create the external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.customerdim ( [customer_key] varchar(100), [customer_city] varchar(100), [customer_country] varchar(100), [customer_name] varchar(100) )
WITH ( LOCATION = '/customerdim/',
       DATA_SOURCE = [salesData],
       FILE_FORMAT = [oaiParquetFormat] )

-- create the external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.productdim ( [product_key] varchar(100), [product_name] varchar(100), [product_base_price] decimal(8,2) )
WITH ( LOCATION = '/productdim/',
       DATA_SOURCE = [salesData],
       FILE_FORMAT = [oaiParquetFormat] )

-- create the external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.salesfact ( [salesfact_key] varchar(100), [store_key] varchar(100), [customer_key] varchar(100), [product_key] varchar(100), [sales_price] decimal(9,2), [sales_units] int, [sales_month] varchar(100), [sales_day] varchar(100), [sales_year] int )
WITH ( LOCATION = '/salesfact/',
       DATA_SOURCE = [salesData],
       FILE_FORMAT = [oaiParquetFormat] )

-- create the external table
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.storedim ( [store_key] varchar(100), [store_city] varchar(100), [store_country] varchar(100) )
WITH ( LOCATION = '/storedim/',
       DATA_SOURCE = [salesData],
       FILE_FORMAT = [oaiParquetFormat] )

select * from dbo.storedim
